title: Mobile Application Developer
tagsAndSkills: Flutter Development,Android Application Development,Ios Development,Flutter,IOS,Application development,Mobile development,Development
jobDescription:
Urgently hiring aMobile app developer for a reputed facility management company. As a Mobile App Developer, you will work closely with our design and product teams to understand project requirements and translate them into fully functional mobile applications. You will be responsible for developing and maintaining the codebase, implementing new features and improvements, as well as debugging and fixing any issues that may arise. Additionally, you will collaborate with other developers to ensure code quality and take part in code reviews.

Experience

  • 4 to 5 years of experience working for mid / large IT firms
  • Should have developed a minimum of 2 Android and 2 iOS mobile applications using Flutter
  • Should have developed, enhanced and maintained a minimum of 1 Android and 1 iOS native mobile applications
  • AWS certified with good understanding of cloud concepts and aware of cloud native product building frameworks
  • Should have good knowledge on REST APIs for integration with mobile apps

Responsibilities

  • Develop, maintain, and enhance mobile applications using Flutter framework
  • Collaborate with cross-functional teams to define, design, and ship new features
  • Write clean, efficient, and well-documented code
  • Debug and fix issues reported by users or testers
  • Ensure code quality by conducting regular code reviews
  • Stay up-to-date with the latest industry trends and leverage best practices
  • Optimize application performance for maximum speed and scalability

Requirements

  • Proven experience as a Mobile App Developer with a focus on Flutter
  • Strong knowledge of Dart programming language and Flutter framework
  • Familiarity with mobile app development processes, tools, and best practices
  • Experience with third-party libraries and APIs integration
  • Ability to write clean, maintainable, and testable code
  • Strong problem-solving skills and attention to detail
  • Excellent communication and collaboration skills
  • Self-motivated and able to work independently as well as in a team environment

title: Senior Mobile Application Developer (React Native)
tagsAndSkills: Computer science,Backend,Version control,GIT,Data management,Javascript,application architecture,Mobile applications
jobDescription:
• Design, develop, and maintain high-performance, reusable, and reliable React Native code for our mobile applications.
  • Integrate and optimize mapping technologies (e.g., Google Maps, Mapbox) within our mobile applications.
  • Collaborate with cross-functional global teams, including designers, product managers, and backend developers, to define, design, and ship new features.
  • Coordinate closely with teams based in Canada and the US for requirements gathering and project alignment.
  • Ensure the best possible performance, quality, and responsiveness of applications.
  • Identify and correct bottlenecks and fix bugs to improve application performance.
  • Conduct code reviews and mentor junior developers to ensure high-quality code and adherence to best practices.
  • Stay updated with the latest industry trends and technologies to ensure our mobile applications are up-to-date and innovative.
  • Work closely with the QA team to ensure comprehensive test coverage and continuous integration/continuous deployment (CI/CD) processes.
  • Participate in Agile/Scrum development processes and contribute to sprint planning, estimations, and retrospectives.
  • Be flexible with working hours to ensure maximum overlap with the US team for effective communication and collaboration
Qualifications:
  • Bachelor s or Master s degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or a related field.
  • 5+ years of professional experience in mobile application development.
  • 3+ years of experience with React Native.
  • Strong proficiency in JavaScript and TypeScript.
  • Working with large data plotting using SDKs
  • Solid understanding of mobile application architecture and design patterns.
  • Experience with integrating mapping technologies (e.g., Google Maps API, Mapbox, Apple Maps).
  • Familiarity with state management libraries such as Redux or MobX.
  • Experience with RESTful APIs to connect mobile applications to backend services.
  • Experience with version control systems, such as Git.
  • Knowledge of mobile app deployment processes on both iOS and Android platforms.
  • Understanding of native build tools, like Xcode, Android Studio, and Gradle.
  • Experience with automated testing frameworks, such as Jest and Detox.
  • Excellent problem-solving skills and attention to detail.
  • Strong communication skills and the ability to work well in a global team environment.
  • Proven experience working with global teams and coordinating with teams based in different time zones.
Preferred Skills:
  • Experience with native mobile development (Swift, Objective-C, Kotlin, or Java).
  • Familiarity with GraphQL and Apollo Client.
  • Knowledge of cloud services, such as AWS or Firebase.
  • Experience with mobile analytics and performance monitoring tools.
  • Prior experience with location-based services and geofencing.

title: React Native Mobile Application Developer
jobDescription:
Dear Candidate,


We at TATA Technologies looking for experienced candidate for React Native (with flutter) for Pune location. Please check the below JD, if matches to your profile kindly share your resume on

sayali.yadav@tatatechnologies.com


Job Title: React Native Developer

Total Experience: 3-5 Years

Location: Pune (WFO)

Mandatory Skills: React Native, Flutter


Role & responsibilities:

Should have 3+years exp in mobility, building applications and publishing to Play Store with min of 3 years of experience using React Native.

  •     Strong knowledge of Java script and React JS.
  •     Experience with RESTful APIs to connect React Native applications with backend services
  •     Strong knowledge of React Native design principles, patterns, and best practices
  •     Experience with offline storage, threading, and performance tuning.
  •     Should be able to implement clean, modern, smooth animations and transitions that
    provide an excellent user experience.
  •     Should have sound experience in generating builds for Android and iOS.
  •     Knowledge of the open source React Native ecosystem and the libraries available for
    common tasks.
  •     Exposure to create and maintain continuous integration and delivery of React Native
    applications.
  •     Ability to understand business requirements and translate them into technical requirements
  •     Familiarity with cloud message APIs and push notifications
  •     Proficient understanding of code versioning tools, such as Git
  •     Integrating mobile client-side features such as contacts, maps, calendar or messaging
  •     Collaborate with cross-functional teams to analyze, design, and ship new features
  •     Fully responsible for mobile app development in the team 
  •     Build and publish applications in app stores 
  •     Implement new technologies to maximize application performance
  •     Is acquainted with Agile delivery process.
  •     Should participate in Requirement understanding workshop and capture the Requirement in
    detail.
  •     Should design the solution Approach and Come out with optimized effort estimates.
  •     Should 
  •     Defining the technical specifications for the implementation of the mobile solution
  •     Support in technical solution and architecture documents, artifacts, work products

and presentations for the customer.

  •     Develop reusable artifacts/frameworks, re-usable assets, Industry solutions, reference
    architecture, design, development, security coding and QA best practice
  •     Ensure best practices in integrating mobile apps with web-services and external APIs are
    adhered.
  •     Understanding of mobile security protocols, analytics and social channel integration.
  •     Ensure alignment of best practices in various non-functional aspects in mobile application
    design and provide a solution to optimize performance, scalability etc.
  •     Responsible for successfully designing and managing the delivery of mobile solutions
  •     Contribute toward excellence in a highly collaborative, team-oriented environment
  •     Enforce sound development practices and ensure the quality delivery of enterprise

mobile solutions.

  •     Work closely with Project Managers, Senior Business Analysts, QA and UX teams

Qualifications:

Education: B.E./B.Tech/MCA or equivalent in computer education from reputed. 

  •     Experience and Certifications in Android development 
  •     Exposure to Dev Ops.
  •     3 - 5. years of experience in overall Enterprise Mobility Development , Min 3 yrs in React Native.

Personal qualities & behavioral traits:

  •     Excellent verbal and written communication skills.
  •     Excellent analytical skills.
  •     Empathy
  •     Goal Setting and Planning
  •     Excellent Problem-Solving capabilities.
  •     Should take ownership of deliverables and drive independently.
